comments.body: "-1" really indicates that "the #threads will be set to default values in TFLite interpreter, and the default value might be 1 or other values". Admittedly, the current default #threads used inside TFLite interpreter is just 1. Could you add a comment about this logic?

@multiverse-tf : The default value changes from context to context, so we can not put those values here, as later if those changes, this info will become stale, so it needs some maintenance. I think that comment may not be required. Please let me know your opinion. Thanks!

My comment is about to make the meaning of "-1" less confusing here.  Particularly, as for your comment "User may use -1, to reset to default values", at the first sight, I thought the default value is "-1". Also, you might want to add such comment to the header file where this function is declared.
+1. It looks much more clear! Thx!
